title: Strengthening Clinical Practical Competencies: 4D Development Model-Based Framework for Enhancing Elementary Reading Literacy

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: They can develop an implementation plan for the four stages of the 4D development model (Define-Design-Develop-Disseminate)
They can design literacy enhancement activity modules utilizing smartphone-based digital resources
They can develop a reading proficiency assessment tool for third-grade elementary school students as a project outcome

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
